channel.title: Getting started on cu.css
channel.description: Recent content in Getting started on cu.css

item.title: Installation
item.description: There are currently two different ways to install cu.css in your project, depending on whether you prefer to work with CSS or SASS. Installing CSS Follow these steps if you plan to work with CSS: Download the full project from Github. Copy main.css or main.min.css from the public folder into your project. Copy the fonts directory into your project. The final step is to link to your stylesheet file inside the <head> of your pages:
